description: Numerators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(702).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,106,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (26 +53*x +26*x^2 -x^3)/(1- 106*x^2 +x^4), - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 21 2013a(n) = 106*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 22 2013
mathematica: Numerator[Convergents[Sqrt[702], 30]] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Sep 28 2012 *)CoefficientList[Series[(26 + 53 x + 26 x^2 - x^3)/(1 - 106 x^2 + x^4), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 21 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[26, 53, 2782, 5617]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 106*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 22 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
